top_block.paragraph_1: Spring at the World Equestrian Center in Ocala marks the return of world-class competition. The WEC Spring Series brings together top riders from across the country, set against the stunning backdrop of Floridaâ€™s Horse Capital. With hunter and jamper classes in focus, the event captures the spirit of spring competition in a setting of open elegance.
top_block.paragraph_2: The World Equestrian Center in Ocala is a state-of-the-art venue venue with gorgeous grounds, a luxurious hotel, and every imaginable amenities. Situated in the heart of Florida, the center features massive indoor and outdoor arenas, with state-of-the-art and horsemanship venues all year round.
top_block.bridge: WEC Ocala Spring serves as a celebration of class, community, and competition in one of america''s finest horse venue locations.
